TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DeploymentProgressState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: 指定目前的 ClickOnce 下載作業階段。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState> 藉由傳遞<xref:System.Deployment.Application.DownloadProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A>隸屬<xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs>，這由<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>， <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>，和<xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>事件。 使用這個列舉的成員來判斷哪些部分[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]部署已下載到本機電腦。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例會安裝最新[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式以非同步方式更新。
[!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState DownloadingApplicationFiles = int32(2)

Docs.summary: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 正在下載構成應用程式的 DLL 和資料檔案。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState DownloadingApplicationInformation = int32(1)

Docs.summary: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 正在下載應用程式資訊清單。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState DownloadingDeploymentInformation = int32(0)

Docs.summary: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 正在下載部署資訊清單。
